metricspace.entropy package¶

Submodules¶

metricspace.entropy.histbi module¶

metricspace.entropy.histbi.histbi(cvec, estimate_type, param=None)[source]¶

Calculates the bias estimate for the naive plugin histogram entropy estimate, in bits.

Parameters:

  • cvec (numpy.ndarray) – Vector of counts.

  • estimate_type (str) – Type of bias estimation. ‘ja’ for jackknife estimate, ‘tp’ for Treves-Panzeri estimate. - ‘ja’ uses the jackknife estimate of the bias, which is the more conservative option.

  • param (int, optional) – Additional parameter for specific bias estimation. Default is None.

Returns:

Bias estimate in bits.

Return type:

float

metricspace.entropy.histinfo module¶

metricspace.entropy.histinfo.histinfo(pvec)[source]¶

Calculates the histogram information, in bits. Computes the entropy of the table, not the mutual information between rows and columns as tblx* functions do.

Parameters:

pvec (numpy.ndarray) – Vector of probabilities.

Returns:

Histogram information in bits.

Return type:

float

metricspace.entropy.histjabi module¶

metricspace.entropy.histjabi.histjabi(cvec)[source]¶

Calculates the jackknife bias that should be added to the naive plugin estimate, in bits.

Parameters:

cvec (numpy.ndarray) – Vector of counts.

Returns:

Jackknife bias in bits.

Return type:

float

metricspace.entropy.histtpbi module¶

metricspace.entropy.histtpbi.histtpbi(cvec, useall=0)[source]¶

Calculates the Treves-Panzeri bias that should be added to the naive plugin estimate, in bits.

Parameters:

  • cvec (numpy.ndarray) – Vector of counts.

  • useall (int, optional) – Use all bins or specific bins based on the parameter. Default is 0.

Returns:

Treves-Panzeri bias in bits.

Return type:

float

metricspace.entropy.tblxbi module¶

metricspace.entropy.tblxbi.tblxbi(ctabl, estimate_type, param=None)[source]¶

Calculates the Treves-Panzeri or jackknife bias correction to be added to the naive transinformation estimate, in bits.

Parameters:

  • ctabl (numpy.ndarray) – 2-dimensional array of counts.

  • estimate_type (str) – Type of bias estimation. ‘ja’ for jackknife estimate, ‘tr’ for Treves-Panzeri estimate.

  • param (int, optional) – Additional parameter for specific bias estimation. Default is None.

Returns:

Bias correction estimate in bits.

Return type:

float

metricspace.entropy.tblxinfo module¶

metricspace.entropy.tblxinfo.tblxinfo(tabl)[source]¶

Calculates the transinformation, in bits.

Parameters:

tabl (numpy.ndarray) – 2-dimensional array of probabilities.

Returns:

Transinformation in bits.

Return type:

float

metricspace.entropy.tblxtpbi module¶

metricspace.entropy.tblxtpbi.tblxtpbi(ctabl, useall=0)[source]¶

Calculates the Treves-Panzeri bias correction to be added to the naive transinformation estimate, in bits.

Parameters:

  • ctabl (numpy.ndarray) – 2-dimensional array of counts.

  • useall (int, optional) – Use all bins or specific bins based on the parameter. Default is 0.

Returns:

Treves-Panzeri bias correction estimate in bits.

Return type:

float
